name: Busy cat
description:
This game is made for a game development 1 course at ArtCenter College of Design. This is my 2nd term.

This is a 2D Top-down Role playing game. 

On Cat Island, many cats have lost their packages. Now you, as the only delivery man on Cat Island, need to pick up lost packages from the roadside and return them back  to their original owners. Become the savior of the Cat Island by delivering packages!

[Player can use WADS to control the avatar, right click to pick up packages, and left click to place down packages.]

Hope you enjoy the game. 

Please leave comments if you want to. It will help me a lot. 

Thank you. 

Demi Liu

List of Features: 

  • Cute pixel art style
  • Fast pace
  • Delivering packages!

Most image sprites are from Cainos https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/40001
